nodes.content: Classroom NE - I need to find a way out of the classroom.
What should I ask Jonathan about?
Can you help me open the window to get out?
Do you want help with your calculus?
Do you own a cell phone?
${scene.setAnimation( 'Calculus', 'invisible' ),''}What should I ask Mr. Ralgo about?
We are stuck in this classroom.
You do not look that busy.
I can see these things from here:
Do you have the key to the A/V room?
Should I pick up the stapler?
